gw.api.contact

Class ProximitySearchPageHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.contact.ProximitySearchPageHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PageHelper
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ABProximitySearchPageHelper

    public class ProximitySearchPageHelper
extends Object
implements PageHelper
    Helper for Address Book pages and provides session-specific utility functions for pages which need proximity search functionality. This includes some pages not in the Address Book tab, such as those used for Admin and Assignment User searches.

    • Method Detail

      • displayDirectionsColumns

        boolean displayDirectionsColumns(com.guidewire.pl.system.service.search.CommonContactSearchCriteria csc)
        Checks whether or not to display driving directions columns such as Driving Distance, Driving Time, and the Directions link.
        Parameters:
        csc - the local contact search criteria
        Returns:
        true if the columns should be displayed.

      • paramsFor

        ProximitySearchPageHelper.ProximitySearchParameterHelper paramsFor(Bean bean)
        Used to get the parameters for a specific set of Search Criteria.
        Parameters:
        bean - normally the page's SearchCriteria, this is used to select a particular set of dropdown parameters.
        Returns:
        the parameters for a specific set of Search Criteria.

      • proximitySearchParameterRange

        ProximitySearchParameters[] proximitySearchParameterRange(int[] numbers,
                                                        String[] unitOfDistanceTypeKeys,
                                                        Boolean[] isDistanceBased,
                                                        Bean bean)
        Generates the dropdown for selecting the parameters for a proximity search. The dropdown is used to select a radius or number of n-nearest search items.

        Note that the three arrays must be of equal size, and all three values must be set.

        Parameters:
        numbers - an array of integers representing the set of selectable values for this search
        unitOfDistanceTypeKeys - an array of strings (type keys) indicating the unit of distance for each of the set of numbers for this search
        isDistanceBased - an array of Booleans indicating whether selectable value for this search is distance based (by radius) or ordinal (by nearest n)
        bean - normally the page's SearchCriteria, this is used to select a particular set of dropdown parameters.
        Returns:
        a ProximitySearchParameters array containing the drop-down parameters

      • useGeocodeUILocally

        Boolean useGeocodeUILocally()
        Check if the Geocode UI is enabled for use in non-Address Book pages in config.xml.
        Returns:
        true if Configured to allow local Geocode UI to display

      • useGeocodeUIinAddressBook

        Boolean useGeocodeUIinAddressBook()
        Check if the Geocode UI is enabled for use in Address Book pages in config.xml.
        Returns:
        true if Configured to allow Address Book Geocode UI to display

      • useMetricDistance

        Boolean useMetricDistance()
        /** Checks the system default unit of distance, as configured in config.xml.
        Returns:
        false if system defaults to US/Imperial units; true if system defaults to Metric units.
